name: document-service
description: Starter Kit for running Headless-Chrome by Puppeteer on AWS Lambda

scripts.package: yarn package-prepare && cp chrome/headless_shell.tar.gz dist && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-prepare: yarn lint && yarn babel && cp -r package.json dist && cd dist && yarn --production && cp -a ../src/templates/. ./templates
scripts.babel: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir dist
scripts.local: yarn babel && cp -a src/templates/. dist/templates && cp -r node_modules dist && node dist/local/index.js
